Footer.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in creating robust and scalable digital solutions for the business sector.

about.txt1: Young Full Stack Web Developer with the ability to plan and execute projects efficiently, excelling in problem-solving through structured reasoning and pattern recognition. Experienced in the strategic use of various technologies, advanced use of Git and GitHub for version control as well as Bitbucket, and collaborative work environments. Quickly grasps technical challenges and has knowledge in data engineering and data warehouse management, focused on creating modern, scalable, and well-structured web solutions. Proactive, responsible, and with strong communication skills.
about.txt2: Fifth-year student pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Universidad Modular Abierta de Santa Ana, with solid academic training and a high degree of autonomy and independence in learning. Complements his education with the Ethical Hacker Certificate and the Introduction to Cybersecurity Certificate, both offered by Networking Academy, strengthening his knowledge in information security and best technological practices.
about.txt3: Part-time Instructor at Data System Computadoras ‚Äî (2 years)
about.txt4: Taught technical and technological subjects, including advanced office software, graphic design, technical support (preventive and corrective maintenance, hardware and network installation), web programming, social media marketing, and virtual platform management. Experience in hands-on teaching, student mentoring, and solving real-world technical issues.
about.txt5: Freelance Full Stack Middle Developer ‚Äî (1 year)
about.txt6: Developed a web application for the company TKIERO, participating in the design, implementation, and deployment of the project into production.
about.txt8: I'm currently actively seeking job opportunities and open to employment offers, ready to join new projects and teams.

proyectos.txt1: This project was developed using the C# programming language with the ASP.NET framework and SQL Server as the database management system. The web interface was built using HTML, CSS with Bootstrap 5 for responsive design, and JavaScript for dynamic interactivity. Architecturally, the Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern was adopted.
proyectos.txt2: This project is a web-based marketplace developed in Java using Spring Boot and Hibernate, with PostgreSQL as the database. The architecture follows the MVC pattern, clearly separating entities, repositories, and services. The interface was built with Thymeleaf and Tailwind CSS.
proyectos.txt3: This repository contains a collection of 120 projects developed in Python, designed as practical and modular tools. Each script has a clear functional purpose, covering automation, graphical user interfaces, and API handling.
proyectos.txt4: This section highlights some of the most outstanding projects.

home.txt3: I am a full stack developer passionate about creating robust and scalable digital solutions for the business sector. I am also deeply curious, constantly facing challenges and self-imposed goals to improve my skills and refine my knowledge of emerging technologies.
